competitors.name: Majesco
competitors.notes: Technology and insurance experience provider for P&C and L&AH insurers, platform solutions for core insurance functions, data management, analytics, distribution, underwriting, loss control, and digital services

competitors.name: Vitech
competitors.notes: Listed as one of Guidewire's top competitors

competitors.name: Sapiens
competitors.notes: Provides insurance software solutions across various sectors of the insurance industry

competitors.name: Duck Creek Technologies
competitors.notes: Solutions provider focused on P&C and general insurance industry with cloud-based platform for insurance systems

competitors.name: BriteCore
competitors.notes: Cloud-native core insurance platform for P&C insurers, trusted by over 90 insurers across North America, enables medium size carriers and MGAs to efficiently manage insurance operations

competitors.name: Insurity
competitors.notes: Provider of cloud-based software solutions for the P&C insurance industry

competitors.name: Tia Technology
competitors.notes: Listed as competitor and similar company to Guidewire Software

competitors.name: Prima Solutions
competitors.notes: Listed as competitor and similar company to Guidewire Software

competitors.name: EZLynx
competitors.notes: Alternative application similar to Guidewire InsuranceSuite

competitors.name: Origami Risk
competitors.notes: Alternative application similar to Guidewire InsuranceSuite

context: By 2020, Guidewire had achieved significant market presence with a market cap of $6.63B and ranked 2nd among major competitors for NPS (with Salesforce 1st and IBM 3rd). The competitive landscape had expanded with both established enterprise players and emerging cloud-native platforms. Core competitors remained relatively consistent with earlier years, but cloud-based solutions became more prominent.
